title: Culturally Heritage-Based Computing Education Design: Application to Language Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computing concepts, general interest in cultural heritage
context.additional_context: Environment for professionals to strengthen innovative problem-solving skills by learning computing concepts through cultural contexts in language domains

learning_goals: Learners explain three or more computing concepts (algorithms, data representation, etc.) using cultural heritage case studies
Learners can plan and develop computing projects reflecting their cultural backgrounds
Learners can explain methodologies for integrating cultural elements into computing solutions using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
